Articles.Content:
I got tired of making a lander every time I needed one so I decided to make one that could do it all. I call it the All Purpose Lander (APL). I can land on water or land, Land and take of vertically, or as a plane. Can be refueled and is 

perfectly balanced.

I present the APL

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/4MFwd)

APL [Here](http://kerbalx.com/Snakedoctor15/APL-10)

Fuel Pod [Here](http://kerbalx.com/Snakedoctor15/APL-Fuel-Pod)
